mapper.select: SELECT a.nickname AS user_name, ifnull(a.profile_picture, ' ') AS profile_picture, ifnull(b.join_club_status, '0') AS join_club_status, ifnull(c.competition_count, '0') AS user_competition_number, ifnull(d.sprots_count, '0') AS user_sports_camp_number, COALESCE (f1.fans, 0) AS followers_count, COALESCE (f2.following, 0) AS following_count FROM ( SELECT COALESCE (nickname, '未设置昵称') AS nickname, user_id, profile_picture FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, join_club_status FROM user_detail WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ) b ON a.user_id = b.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT x1.user_id, count(1) competition_count FROM user_competition x1, competition x2 WHERE x1.competition_id = x2.competition_id AND x1.user_id = #{user_id} AND x2.is_delete = '0' AND ( x1.user_competition_status = '1' OR x1.user_competition_status = '99' ) ) c ON a.user_id = c.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT x1.user_id, count(1) AS sprots_count FROM user_sports_camp x1 LEFT JOIN sports_camp x2 ON x1.sports_camp_id = x2.sports_camp_id AND x2.is_delete = 0 WHERE x1.user_id = #{user_id} ) d ON a.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT user_id, count(follower_id) fans FROM follower WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ) f1 ON a.user_id = f1.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT follower_id, count(user_id) AS following FROM follower WHERE follower_id = #{user_id} ) f2 ON a.user_id = f2.follower_id
SELECT COUNT(1) as counts FROM event_registration a where a.user_id = #{user_id} and a.my_status = 1
